materials: High-quality Gold Plated base metal adorned with cubic zirconia stones. Excellent durability and a brilliant
diamond-like sparkle. Hyderabadi Polish provides a lasting
features: Sleek and modern design featuring a series of meticulously cut cubic zirconia stones set within a geometric pattern. The open-ended style allows for easy wear and removal. The diamond cut reflects light beautifully, creating a captivating sparkle. The bangle is also lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
colors: sparkling cubic zirconia stones. The warm gold tone complements a wide range of skin tones and outfits.
occasions: and as a subtle yet elegant addition to traditional attire for functions like weddings or festivals.
description: Combines modern aesthetics with the timeless elegance of bangles. The high-quality materials and craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. The diamond-cut cubic zirconia stones offer a dazzling sparkle that rivals genuine diamonds at an accessible price point. The open-ended design provides comfort and ease of wear. An excellent value for money, offering a luxurious look without the premium price tag.
